column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
After all that traipsing around the desert, you finally have the chance to do something heroic.
Search for the girl's brother and defeat the yeheheceyaa.
Speak with the strapping young lad.
Me and my brother were cloudfishing, and we were attacked by a yeheheceyaa! He told me to run, so I did, but he stayed behind to fight it!
He's still down by the cliffs, and if you hurry, you'll make it in time! You'll go help him, won't you?
Please, you have to save him!
Thank you... If you hadn't turned up when you did, I'd be a goner for sure!
I'd better go let my sister know I'm all right. Besides, it ain't safe here, so I suggest you head back to town as well. Maybe I'll see you there?
You did it! My brother's alive, and it's all because of you!
Good to see you again. So my sister is the one who sent you to rescue me? Looks like I owe my life to both of you!

Truth be told, a yeheheceyaa is the last thing I expected to see, never mind being attacked by one. They must've expanded their territory or something, so I'd better stay away from the cliff tops for a while.

That said, we make our living off the creatures we catch there, so we can't give up on cloudfishing altogether. I suppose the nearest safe spot would be somewhere near the bridge to Tuliyollal, which is kind of far from here... Still, better than no fishing at all!
Speaking of which, it's time to go snag us some more fish! Thanks again, friend. Stay safe out there, you hear?
